title: Scrambler 1200

Tyre Selector - Road - D71; D74; DS4; DS1
Scrambler 1200 XC, Scrambler 1200 XE and Scrambler 1200 Steve McQueen Edition
Dual purpose tyres (approved by Triumph for off road and on road use in some countries only). The permissible maximum speed for dual purpose tyres is 60 mph (100 km/h).
Tyre Selector - Road - D71; D74; DS4; DR4
Scrambler 1200 XC from VIN AE9098, Scrambler 1200 XE from VIN AC 8499, Scrambler 1200 Steve McQueen Edition, Scrambler 1200 Bond Edition
Mud and Snow (M+S) tyres (approved by Triumph for off road and on road use in some countries only). The permissible maximum speed for M+S tyres is 60 mph (100 km/h).
